20101201153209.750|20101201153211.000|CCO|DREAM TRIP WITH HER FATHER, 
20101201153211.000|20101201153212.667|CCO|SAILING DOWN TO THE TROPICS.
20101201153212.667|20101201153214.333|CCO|IT WAS THEIR FIRST VOYAGE 
20101201153214.333|20101201153216.000|CCO|TOGETHER AND THEIR LAST 
20101201153216.000|20101201153217.667|CCO|TOGETHER.
20101201153217.667|20101201153219.333|CCO|FOR AMANDA THORN, IT WAS GOING 
20101201153219.333|20101201153221.000|CCO|TO BE THE TRIP OF A LIFETIME,

20101201153225.000|20101201153227.000|CCO|TO THE VIRGIN ISLANDS.
20101201153227.000|20101201153229.000|CCO|AND THE FIRST TIME IN HER LIFE

20101201153234.333|20101201153237.667|CCO|>> JUST TO HAVE A VACATION AND 
20101201153237.667|20101201153241.000|CCO|SPEND TIME WITH DAD.
20101201153241.000|20101201153242.429|CCO|>> Reporter: WILLIE THORN, A 
20101201153242.429|20101201153243.857|CCO|MASTER CARPENTER AND SAILOR 
20101201153243.857|20101201153245.286|CCO|LIVED IN BOSTON.
20101201153245.286|20101201153246.714|CCO|AND THIS EXCURSION WAS TO BE ONE

20101201153254.333|20101201153256.000|CCO|IT WOULDN'T STOP.
20101201153256.000|20101201153257.667|CCO|30-FOOT SEAS AND PURE FEAR.
20101201153257.667|20101201153259.333|CCO|>> IT WAS LIKE THE PERFECT 
20101201153259.333|20101201153301.000|CCO|STORM, THEY DON'T PREDICT IT, IT
20101201153301.000|20101201153304.333|CCO|COMES UP AT THE LAST MINUTE.
20101201153304.333|20101201153307.667|CCO|>> Reporter: AND LIKE THE MOVIE 
20101201153307.667|20101201153311.000|CCO|"THE PERFECT STORM" IT WAS A 
20101201153311.000|20101201153312.429|CCO|NOR'EASTER.

20101201153313.857|20101201153315.286|CCO|SAILORS, FOR FOUR DAYS BATTERED.

20101201154701.000|20101201154711.000|CCO|>>> THIS MORN ON "TODAY'S" 
20101201154711.000|20101201154714.333|CCO|HEALTH WOMEN AND MAMMOGRAMS.
20101201154714.333|20101201154717.667|CCO|THIS REPORT SEEMS TO FLY IN THE 
20101201154717.667|20101201154721.000|CCO|FACE OF LAST YEAR'S REPORT THAT 
20101201154721.000|20101201154722.667|CCO|WOMEN DON'T NEED MAMMOGRAMS 
20101201154722.667|20101201154724.333|CCO|UNTIL THE AGE OF 50.
20101201154724.333|20101201154726.000|CCO|LAST YEAR, THE U.S. PREVENTATIVE
20101201154726.000|20101201154727.667|CCO|SERVICES TASK FORCE RECOMMENDED 
20101201154727.667|20101201154729.333|CCO|CHANGING GUIDELINES FOR BREAST 
20101201154729.333|20101201154731.000|CCO|CANCER SCREENING.
20101201154731.000|20101201154733.000|CCO|IT RECOMMENDED THAT WOMEN BEGIN 
20101201154733.000|20101201154735.000|CCO|GETTING MAMMOGRAMS AT THE AGE OF
20101201154735.000|20101201154737.000|CCO|50 INSTEAD OF 40 AND THEN ONLY 
20101201154737.000|20101201154739.000|CCO|ONCE EVERY TWO YEARS.
20101201154739.000|20101201154741.000|CCO|THAT CAUSED A LOT OF CONFUSION 
20101201154741.000|20101201154743.000|CCO|AND A LOT OF CONTROVSY LAST 
20101201154743.000|20101201154745.000|CCO|YEAR.
20101201154745.000|20101201154747.000|CCO|NOW YOU HAVE THIS NEW STUDY OUT 
20101201154747.000|20101201154749.000|CCO|OF ENGLAND WHICH FINDS THAT 
20101201154749.000|20101201154751.000|CCO|WOMEN OVER AGE 50 HAD A 
20101201154751.000|20101201154753.000|CCO|SIGNIFICANTLY REDUCED RISK OF 
20101201154753.000|20101201154755.000|CCO|MASTECTOMY.
20101201154755.000|20101201154757.000|CCO|WHY IS THAT SIGNIFICANT?
20101201154757.000|20101201154759.000|CCO|>> THIS IS SIGNIFICANT BECAUSE 
20101201154759.000|20101201154801.000|CCO|THIS CURRENT STUDY FROM THE UK 
20101201154801.000|20101201154802.667|CCO|HELPED US IDENTIFY ANOTHER 
20101201154802.667|20101201154804.333|CCO|BENEFIT FOR BREAST CANCER 
20101201154804.333|20101201154806.000|CCO|SCREENING.
20101201154806.000|20101201154807.667|CCO|THE TASK FORCE WAS VERY FOCUSSED
20101201154807.667|20101201154809.333|CCO|ON AN ANALYSIS OF WHETHER OR NOT
20101201154809.333|20101201154811.000|CCO|MAMMOGRAMS HELPED SAVE LIVES.
20101201154811.000|20101201154813.000|CCO|THIS STUDY SAYS WE CAN FIND 
20101201154813.000|20101201154815.000|CCO|ANOTHER BENEFIT TO EARLY 
20101201154815.000|20101201154817.000|CCO|DETECTION, SO NOT JUST SURVIVAL 
20101201154817.000|20101201154819.000|CCO|IS AN ISSUE, BUT THE ABILITY TO 
20101201154819.000|20101201154821.000|CCO|HAVE MORE FAVORABLE AND 
20101201154821.000|20101201154823.500|CCO|ACCEPTABLE TREATMENT METHODS AND
20101201154823.500|20101201154826.000|CCO|AVOID MASTECTOMY IF THE CANCER 
20101201154826.000|20101201154828.500|CCO|IS DETECTED EARLY. 
20101201154828.500|20101201154831.000|CCO|>> THIS COMES ON THE HEELS OF 
20101201154831.000|20101201154832.667|CCO|ANOTHER STUDY THAT CAME OUT THAT
20101201154832.667|20101201154834.333|CCO|SAID THAT BREAST CANCER 
20101201154834.333|20101201154836.000|CCO|SCREENINGS BETWEEN THE AGE OF 40
20101201154836.000|20101201154837.667|CCO|AND 50 REDUCES THE NUMBER OF 
20101201154837.667|20101201154839.333|CCO|BREAST CANCER DEATHS.
20101201154839.333|20101201154841.000|CCO|DO YOU ENVISION THE TASK FORCE 
20101201154841.000|20101201154843.000|CCO|POSSIBLY CHANGING ITS 
20101201154843.000|20101201154845.000|CCO|RECOMMENDATION?
20101201154845.000|20101201154847.000|CCO|>> I THINK GOOD GUIDELINES 
20101201154847.000|20101201154849.000|CCO|SHOULD BE REVISITED FROM TIME TO
20101201154849.000|20101201154851.000|CCO|TIME IN THE LIGHT OF NEW DATE 
20101201154851.000|20101201154853.000|CCO|THAT THAT EMERGES AND A TASK 
20101201154853.000|20101201154855.000|CCO|FORCE THIS LIKE THAT BASES THEIR
20101201154855.000|20101201154857.000|CCO|RECOMMENDATIONS ON MODELING OF
